rdf:Description.dc:description: Designed for use in teaching Topic 8C of the 1981 Alberta Social Studies Curriculum, "Nationhood and Citizenship in Asia and Africa."
"Co-funding and assistance provided by the Canadian Red Cross Society, Alberta Disaster Services, and the Canadian International Development Agency".--Container.
